text: Erdon Daci (born 4 July 1998) is a Macedonian professional footballer who plays as a forward for the Turkish club Konyaspor. ==Professional career== On 22 July 2019, Daci signed a professional contract with Konyaspor for 3 years. Daci made his professional debut for Konyaspor in a 0-0 Süper Lig tie with MKE Ankaragücü on 18 August 2019. ==International career== Daci was born in Macedonia and is of Albanian descent. He represented the North Macedonia U21s internationally. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Skopje Category:Albanian footballers from North Macedonia Category:Association football forwards Category:Macedonian footballers Category:North Macedonia youth international footballers Category:Konyaspor footballers Category:Süper Lig players Category:Macedonian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Turkey Category:Macedonian expatriate sportspeople in Turkey
title: Erdon Daci
